mapper.insert: insert into reports(id, reporter_id, reported_content_type, reported_content_id, reason, status, created_at, updated_at) values ( #{report.id}, #{report.reporterId}, #{report.reportedContentType}, #{report.reportedContentId}, #{report.reason}, #{report.status}, #{report.createdAt}, #{report.updatedAt} )
mapper.select: select id reportId, reporter_id reportReporterId, reported_content_type reportContentType, reported_content_id reportContentId, reason reportReason, status reportStatus, created_at reportCreatedAt, updated_at reportUpdatedAt from reports where id = #{id}

select id reportId, reporter_id reportReporterId, reported_content_type reportContentType, reported_content_id reportContentId, reason reportReason, status reportStatus, created_at reportCreatedAt, updated_at reportUpdatedAt from reports order by created_at desc

select id reportId, reporter_id reportReporterId, reported_content_type reportContentType, reported_content_id reportContentId, reason reportReason, status reportStatus, created_at reportCreatedAt, updated_at reportUpdatedAt from reports where status = #{status} order by created_at desc
mapper.update: update reports set status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
